(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (NN Dream))
        (VP (VBN come)
          (S
            (ADJP (JJ true))))))
    (. !)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (ADVP (RB already))
      (VP (VBN mentioned)
        (PP (IN about)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NNP Lobster) (NNP Anticlimax) (NNP Phenomenon))
            (PP (IN in)
              (NP (DT an) (JJR earlier) (NN blog)))))
        (SBAR (IN so)
          (S
            (NP (PRP I))
            (VP (VBD was)
              (ADJP
                (NP (DT a) (RB little))
                (JJ apprehensive))
              (SBAR (RB just) (IN before)
                (S
                  (NP (PRP I))
                  (VP (VBD took)
                    (NP
                      (NP (PRP$ my) (JJ first) (NN mouthful))
                      (PP (IN of)
                        (NP (DT the) (NNS noodles))))))))))))
    (. .)))

pobj(in-10, blog-13)

        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB be)

prt(come-4, over-5)
cc(make-1, and-6)
conj(make-1, say-7)
discourse(say-7, hi-8)
